name: Warden
canAlways: Stand up for those you care for.
Keep both eyes on someone.
Stamp your foot and get everyone’s attention.
Perform a display of strength.
Recount a tale of battles old.
Ask: “What aren’t you telling me?”
Offer to teach someone about something you have no expertise in. If they take the offer, they get a Luck Point.

name: Skylark
canAlways: "Have something you’re not supposed to.
Find a way out from between a rock and a hard place.
Spill the beans.
Tell which way is north.
Speak the language of thieves.
Keep calm and focus.
Exclaim: “Do I have the deal for you!” If they hear you out, they get a Luck Point."

name: Magus
canAlways: "Perform a minor miracle.
Jot down something important.
Put your faith in those around you.
Do something out of the ordinairy.
Cite your sources, hoping the help your case.
Recall the teachings of your master.
Ask: “Could you explain?” If they do, they get a Luck Point."
